KONIEC2: ^*You enter the elevator. You go to the floor where there’s your sire’s office. You feel strange, as if something bad happened. You exit the elevator and head to the door.There’s no bodyguard, so you just get straight inside.*
^*Behind a giant, stone table, there’s Stephen. He’s busy talking with Astira, but he notices you immediately when you enter.*
^“How was LA?” Are you kidding me? What happened? Where were you?
^Stephen has left the city. We wanted to check a few things during his absence.
^We’ve found out about a few reports about us. Apparently, a lot of Kindred was plotting against me and my position on the throne.
^Actually, they plot against Astira, not you. Primogen don’t trust her. And it’s not only them.
^Yeah. He blames Astira for everything bad that happens between you two. At first, I thought that he actually had a reason, as there’s something between you...
^You suspected that Astira was feeding me with her blood?
^*You see that Stephen is smiling a bit. Astira’s standing aside and frowns, trying to understand what you’re talking about. She’s not a Malkavian, there’s no reason to explain it to her.*
^It’s understandable for you to think that. Astira’s like a sister to me, I trust her completely. I’m also not surprised that so many Kindred are suspecting her of some schemes.
^Ambrose, you did great. And I’m sorry I didn’t tell you everything.
^I understand, you wanted it to be natural. It’s alright.
^And now, tell me... Who do you think plans to take my place?
